title: Mattia Guerini
text:
Academic Position
Assistant Professor of Economics, Department of Economics and Management, University of Brescia.
Senior Researcher, Fondazione ENI Enrico Mattei (FEEM).

title: Mattia Guerini
text:
Resarch Interests
Topics: macroeconomics, industry dynamics, monetary economics.
Methods: agent-based models, econometrics, validation and calibration.
